definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: jing3 shui3 bu4 fan4 he2 shui3

definition: lit. river water does not interfere with well water (idiom); Do not interfere with one another./Mind your own business.
pinyin: he2 shui3 bu4 fan4 jing3 shui3

sentences.english: The river is yellow because of high content of sand in the water.
sentences.chinese: 黄河水因高含沙量而成黄色。

sentences.english: Standing on the bridge, he could see the river waves sparkling in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 站在桥上，他可以看见河水在月光下闪耀。

sentences.english: Analysis of Seepage and Measures of Seepage Control Strengthening for Right Abutment of Shitouhe Reservoir Dam.
sentences.chinese: 石头河水库大坝右坝肩渗漏分析及防渗加固措施。

sentences.english: The dam backs up the water to prevent flood.
The Euphrates, the colors of the waters.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得幼发拉底河的河水，颜色漂亮极了。

sentences.english: The sweet little Bantam River rose.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的小班坦河水上涨了。

sentences.english: Soon, however, the water i ide had risen to the stairway landing.
sentences.chinese: 可是不多时，楼下的河水已涨到了楼梯平台上。

sentences.english: The swollen river washed away the footbridge.
sentences.chinese: 泛滥的河水冲走了人行桥。

sentences.english: Its muddy water makes the ocean brown for 200 miles.
sentences.chinese: 浑浊的河水使河口200英里范围的海洋变成棕黄色。

sentences.english: All the fish died, even chickens and ducks that drank from the river died.
sentences.chinese: 所有的鱼都死了，鸡鸭喝了河水后也都死了。

sentences.english: The log twiddled round and round in the river.
sentences.chinese: 那根圆木在河水中转来转去。

sentences.english: He goes off in the ice-cold river water, for us a warm enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 他在冰冷的河水中睡去，给我们一个温暖的启示。

sentences.english: Water never stops, it's always flowing.
sentences.chinese: 河水永不止，永远向前走。

sentences.english: It was a very hot day. The water was very refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 天气很热，河水使人振奋。

sentences.english: Residents in the oil city of Poza Rica fled their homes as the water rose.
sentences.chinese: 石油城波查里卡的居民在河水上涨时撤离该地区。

sentences.english: The river is rising after the rain.
